caption:
ALTRA x NICOLE MCLAUGHLIN Upcycling Workshop — September 26 — Denver, CO

We had a great time at our upcycling workshop in collaboration with @nicolemclaughlin. With Nicole leading the way, the workshop gave our guests an opportunity to create an upcycled water bottle holder using salvaged footwear materials from Altra’s development lab.

The purpose of this workshop was to focus on the importance of sustainable design and to inspire new ways of thinking about waste reduction. 

Photos by @amandavillarosa
